response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for me. This unique item is not just a possession; it's a testament to craftsmanship and innovation. Given its significance to me, I believe it deserves to be appreciated by someone who will cherish it as much as I have. I am offering this product to you at a special price of $500,000. Should you choose to accept this offer, you will not only own a valuable asset but also contribute to preserving its legacy. I look forward to hearing your response.", "product_price": 500000}
